au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig

Interface ISlaveAccessAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAction

    public interface ISlaveAccessAction
extends IAction
    Interface for a slave user session action assignment and revocation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean assign(java.lang.String name, boolean passive)
      Assigns slave access to the specified user with specified slave permission type.
      boolean revoke(java.lang.String name, boolean passive)
      Revokes a slaves users access from a rig.

      • Methods inherited from interface au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.IAction

        getActionType, getFailureReason

    • Method Detail

      • assign

        boolean assign(java.lang.String name,
             boolean passive)
        Assigns slave access to the specified user with specified slave permission type.
        Parameters:
        name - master users name
        passive - true if passive slave, false if active slave
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • revoke

        boolean revoke(java.lang.String name,
             boolean passive)
        Revokes a slaves users access from a rig.
        Parameters:
        name - name of user to revoke access from
        passive - true if passive slave, false if active slave
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
